ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
bzip2:
- '1'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
icu:
- '78'
libboost_devel:
- '1.86'
libboost_python_devel:
- '1.86'
pcre2:
- '10.47'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zlib:
- '1'

about.description:
DSSP (Define Secondary Structure of Proteins) is a program that assigns
secondary structure to proteins based on their 3D structure.

It is widely used in structural biology and bioinformatics for analyzing protein
structures.
about.summary: Application to assign secondary structure to proteins

name: dssp

about.description:
DSSP (Define Secondary Structure of Proteins) is a program that assigns
secondary structure to proteins based on their 3D structure.

It is widely used in structural biology and bioinformatics for analyzing protein
structures.
about.summary: Application to assign secondary structure to proteins

raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  name: DSSP
  version: "4.5.8"
  sha256: 634bf8d8dd96954bd680da90f3dcb66b87189c13b12b52b61de8af9d597b74ac
  build_number: 0

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/PDB-REDO/${{ name|lower }}/archive/refs/tags/v${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ${{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: ${{ build_number }}

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler("cxx") }}
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - python
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - cmake
    - if: unix
      then: make
    - if: win
      then:
        - m2-sed
        - jom
    - pkg-config
  host:
    - libboost-devel
    - libboost-python-devel
    - bzip2
    - eigen
    - if: linux and ppc64le  # libboost-devel 1.86.0 for linux-ppc64le does not include any build for icu>=76
      then: icu >=75.0,<76.0a0
      else: icu
    # Refer to https://github.com/conda-forge/dssp-feedstock/issues/31 for this commentout
    # libcifpp is fetched and statically linked during building.
    # - bioconda::libcifpp
    - libmcfp
    - numpy ${{ numpy }}
    - pcre2
    - python ${{ python }}
    - zlib
  run:
    - python ${{ python }}
  run_exports:
    - ${{ pin_subpackage(name|lower, upper_bound="x.x") }}

tests:
  - script:
      - mkdssp --version
      - mkdssp --help

  - script:
      - if: unix
        then: run_test.sh
      - if: win
        then: run_test.bat
    files:
      source:
        - test/1cbs.cif.gz

  - python:
      imports:
        - mkdssp
      pip_check: true

about:
  homepage: https://pdb-redo.eu/dssp
  repository: https://github.com/PDB-REDO/dssp
  documentation: https://github.com/PDB-REDO/dssp/blob/trunk/doc/mkdssp.md
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: "Application to assign secondary structure to proteins"
  description: |
    DSSP (Define Secondary Structure of Proteins) is a program that assigns
    secondary structure to proteins based on their 3D structure.

    It is widely used in structural biology and bioinformatics for analyzing protein
    structures.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - eunos-1128
    - padix-key

about.description:
DSSP (Define Secondary Structure of Proteins) is a program that assigns
secondary structure to proteins based on their 3D structure.

It is widely used in structural biology and bioinformatics for analyzing protein
structures.
about.summary: Application to assign secondary structure to proteins
